content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":512647,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1583ad62-3543-4b71-b589-35ad6ac96d96/19.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1583ad62-3543-4b71-b589-35ad6ac96d96/19.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"19.PNG\",\"name\":\"19.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1583ad62-3543-4b71-b589-35ad6ac96d96\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":989,\"height\":317},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You will receive an invitation to an introduction meeting with \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Karthik_Gandhi\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Karthik Gandhi\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (TR India, Delivery Manager). This meeting is aimed at speeding up your adaptation. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If, for any reason, you have not received the invitation or have any related questions, please reach out to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Karthik_Gandhi\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Karthik Gandhi\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in case of any queries in India onboarding.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
